query:
SELECT
            id,
            username,
            display_name,
            verified,
            admin,
            github_user_id as github_id
        FROM developers
        WHERE username = $1
        OR ( display_name ILIKE '%' || $1 || '%' OR username ILIKE '%' || $1 || '%' )
        ORDER BY
            CASE
                WHEN username = $1 then 1
                else 0
            END DESC
        LIMIT 1
